version_description:
Instant Pay: is a fast and simple tool to do IMPS transactions via SMS to beneficiaries already registered on Citibank Online.
Instant Assist: is a fast and simple application to do enquiry transaction for Banking Account / Credit Card via SMS.

Please note, if you are facing difficulties during the update, please delete the old build from your phone and re-download the new build
New front end skin, UI Change for faster navigation. Introducing Refer & Earn.

Introducing ‘Snapshot’ – You can now securely access your account & credit card details instantly. Check out the “Snapshot” icon on your homepage.
Introducing ‘Notifications’ – You can now receive the latest offers on Citi products through in-app notifications.

Introducing ‘Snapshot’ – You can now securely access your account & credit card details instantly. Check out the ‘Snapshot’ icon on your homepage.
Introducing ‘Notifications’ – You can now receive the latest offers on Citi products through in-app notifications.
Introducing investments on Citi Mobile – now invest in mutual funds on the go with your investment services account.

A complete new look Citi Mobile App with enhanced capabilities
Add new payees on mobile and transfer funds to them instantly
Apply loan on your credit cards and get instant funds
A new look, smarter navigation, new features and much more.

Upload documents for Aadhaar update, KYC refresh & other services
Get statement on email, report loss/stolen card
Citi Mobile app now available for NR customers in USA, UK, UAE, Australia & Singapore
Bug fixes
